TEXT.TITLE: SUBURBAN BANCORP <SUBBA> MERGER APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Suburban Bancorp Inc said it received approval from the Federal Reserve Board to acquire <Valley National Bank of Aurora> for an undisclosed price. Suburban said it has received shareholder tenders for 100 pct of Valley National's stock. Reuter
